attributes.action: Require financial organisations that contact us by telephone to have a formal method of proving that they are who they say they are.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Financial organisations such as banks, credits and the like who contact us by telephone always ask us to provide personal details "as part of the data protection act" before they will continue with the conversation.  However there is no requirement for them to prove that they are who they say they are.  In these days of phishing attacks and identity theft it would be easy to telephone someone and harvest their personal information whilst pretending to be a legitimate organsisation.
